comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: I think this issue got fixed by Marcel in revision 164780 along with other changes. Resolving the issue as "Fixed".

description: In org.apache.jackrabbit.tck.j2ee.RepositoryServlet it says "...puts the reference into the application context" but according to the behavior it should say "...puts the reference into a class variable". In a j2ee environment the application context refers to the ServletConext instance bounded to the web application.
